definition: moderate wind, beautiful sun (idiom); fine sunny weather, esp. in springtime
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: It was a clear, sunny day. The weather was beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 这天风和日丽，天气真好。

sentences.english: It's such a beautiful sunny day.
sentences.chinese: 真是个风和日丽的一天。

sentences.english: Winnie the pooh: I was practicing taking walk and a nap at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 风和日丽，万里无云，小熊维尼在外面散步。

sentences.english: It was a calm, sunny morning, children went out happily for a picnic.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个风和日丽的上午，孩子们高兴地出去野餐了。

sentences.english: It is a beautiful, sunny day at the beach.
sentences.chinese: 这一天的海边风和日丽。

sentences.english: Unless it’s a warm day, I’m only naked inside.
sentences.chinese: 除非风和日丽，要不然我只是赤裸裸地呆在屋里。

sentences.english: We like sitting on the balcony, looking at the beach on sunny days.
sentences.chinese: 风和日丽的日子我们喜欢坐在窗台上看着海滩。

sentences.english: It was a lovely spring day and the rose vine on the trellis was turning green.
sentences.chinese: 那是春季里风和日丽的一天，棚上的玫瑰藤渐渐转绿。
那是个风和日丽的一天。

sentences.english: Good weather out, Huan Shan water to be guests laugh.
sentences.chinese: 风和日丽好出游，山欢水笑待嘉宾。

definition: see 秋高氣爽|秋高气爽[qiu1 gao1 qi4 shuang3]
(idiom) sunlight shines over all things/drenched in sunlight
Heaven is cooperating (idiom)/the weather is favorable for the planned activity (a variation of 天公不作美|天公不作美[tian1 gong1 bu4 zuo4 mei3])
red flowers and green willow/all the colors of spring
